message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $12,500 is still above my budget. I'm happy to go to $11,500. This is my final offer, as I can always go with John for $10,000.
